abstract: The Facebook account of Julius Genachowski, chairman of the Federal Communications Commission, falls prey to social-networking scam artists.
snippet: The Facebook account of Julius Genachowski, chairman of the Federal Communications Commission, falls prey to social-networking scam artists.
lead_paragraph: Update | 3:27 p.m.  Adding statement from Facebook at the end.

headline.main: Whoops! F.C.C. Chairman Spams Facebook Friends
